TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpResponseWrapper extends System.Web.HttpResponseBase

summary.span: 封装 HTTP 内部对象，该对象提供来自 ASP.NET 操作的 HTTP 响应信息。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并作为包装器类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能同时还公开的类类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 类使您能够替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如当你执行单元测试 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基础对象支持异步刷新操作，从异步模块事件或从异步处理程序调用此方法以异步方式执行刷新操作。If the underlying object supports asynchronous flush operations and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or from an asynchronous handler, the flush operation is performed asynchronously. 否则，会以同步方式执行刷新操作。Otherwise, the flush operation is performed synchronously. IIS 6.0 及更高版本支持异步刷新。Asynchronous flush is supported for IIS 6.0 and later.

span.span: The response is already completed.

span.span: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.

summary.span: 有关 Http2 服务器推送的详细信息，请参阅 [HTTP/2 规范第 8.2 节：服务器推送](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources)。

span.span: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).

remarks.format: ## Remarks PushPromise 是不确定的而且应用程序不应具有依赖于它的逻辑。PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it. 其唯一的目的是在某些情况下的性能优势。Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases. 有可能会导致完全忽略推送请求的多个条件 （协议和实现）。There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely. 假定条件下基于即发即弃。The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
